name: Get More Conversions from Your Existing Customers Using Quicker
author: Woooplugin

sections.description:
Quicker is the essential WooCommerce Quick Checkout Plugin that simplifies your store’s checkout process!

Transform multi-step checkouts into a seamless single-step experience, enhancing user satisfaction and driving sales and revenue growth. With the ‚ÄúAdd to Cart‚Äù button on each product, customers can skip the shopping cart page and go straight to checkout, reducing cart abandonment and encouraging quicker purchases.

Stay tuned for more exciting features coming soon!

With the innovative ‚ÄúAdd to Cart‚Äù button on each product, customers can jump straight to checkout, skipping the shopping cart page entirely. This simplified approach not only encourages quicker purchases but also significantly reduces cart abandonment, allowing you to boost sales effortlessly.

But that‚Äôs not all‚Äîstay tuned for even more exciting features coming soon!

Features
üëâ 1 Click Checkout With this feature, your customers can complete their purchase with a single click. There is no need of filling out long forms‚Äîjust fast, easy checkout.

Quick View: Using the Quick view feature customers can easily preview products without leaving the page. This keeps them focused and helps them make quick decisions. The result is more conversions.

üëâ Checkout Field Editor You can add, remove, or reorder checkout fields. This allows to customize the checkout process to your store‚Äôs needs.

üëâ Extra Fees in Checkout It is easy to add some custom fees like service or delivery charges during checkout without any additional codes.

Order Bump: The feature is to help you promoting related products at checkout to increase the average order value. Customers can add these items with a single click.

Product Addons: Let customers choose extras or upgrades during checkout or on the product page. If you have similar products in the store, this feature helps to get more conversions.

Time-Based Menu: Adjust fields based on time, perfect for time-limited offers or special delivery options.

Multi-Step Checkout: Break the checkout into smaller steps. This makes the process easier for customers and can reduce cart abandonment.

What You Can Do with Quicker

Custom Checkout Fields: Add new checkout fields to collect more customer info or remove unnecessary fields to simplify the process.

Multi-Step Checkout: Split the checkout into multiple steps to guide customers through the process easily.

Promote Products in Checkout: Add product addons or special offers at checkout to increase revenue.

Set Order Amount Limits: Set minimum or maximum order amounts for better inventory control and to encourage larger orders.

Cash on Delivery (COD) Option: Let customers choose COD as a payment option.

Mini Cart: Display a mini cart on the page so customers can view items without leaving the checkout.

Why Choose Quicker?

Easy to Use: Simple interface that makes it easy for customers to complete their purchase.

Responsive Design: Works perfectly on all devices‚Äîmobile, tablet, and desktop.

No Coding Required: You can easily customize checkout fields without needing coding skills.

Error-Free Checkout: Ensures a smooth checkout experience without technical issues.

Pebbly Integration: Connects easily with Pebbly for secure payments.

Quick Setup: Get your customized checkout up and running in no time. It is like plug and play.

üî• WHAT‚ÄôS NEXT

If you like Quicker, then consider checking out other WordPress Plugins made by the same team:

üîî Ultimate Membership ‚Äì Create Members for WordPress and WooCommerce and Boost your sales
üîî Filter Plus ‚Äì It is a WordPress and WooCommerce Product Filter Plugin that allows users to add multiple filtering features like filter by Ratings, Tags, Price Range, Custom Fields etc.
üîî Discountify ‚Äì Discount Rules, Dynamic Pricing for WooCommerce

Frequently Asked Questions

How do I add custom checkout fields?
Use Quicker‚Äôs checkout form builder to add custom fields to your WooCommerce checkout.

Can I customize the checkout without coding?
Yes, you can modify the WooCommerce checkout page with minimal or no coding.

Can I remove fields from the checkout?
Yes, you can remove unnecessary fields to make the checkout process faster and more efficient.

Does adding an order bump option require third-party software?
Not at all! Quicker is all you need to add order bumps and offer additional products to customers.

Is Quicker just for editing checkout fields?
Quicker offers versatile features, including adding a mini cart, product add-ons, setting order limits, and more.

How can I offer cash on delivery in my store?
This WooCommerce plugin includes a dedicated feature for adding a cash-on-delivery option. It requires no coding‚Äîsimply drag and drop the feature to activate it!

Can I integrate Quicker with third-party plugins?
Yes, we currently offer Pabbly integration, and more integrations are in development.

Can I access all features for free?
Quicker has both free and Pro options. Some features are available for free, while advanced features require the Pro version.

How do I manage the checkout form?
Quicker provides an easy-to-use tool for managing your WooCommerce checkout form, allowing you to rearrange or edit fields with ease.

What does the checkout form builder do?
It allows you to modify WooCommerce checkout fields, add new ones, and customize the layout to suit your store‚Äôs needs‚Äîall without technical skills.

Do you have a dedicated support team?
Yes, we have a dedicated support team to assist our users with any issues.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/quicker directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. All Settings will be found in Admin sidebar -> quicker
